content: chain 8 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st 11 sts drip seven make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 3 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st 6 sts drip eight make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st 9 sts drip nine make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 8 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st 11 sts drip ten make 1 single_crochet into each of the first 2 sts chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet into each chain across then make 2 single_crochet into the next st finally join the round with a slip_stitch 8 sts *fasten_off link to video https //youtu be/zwlng3ubo5i if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
